name: Devochka Quest
description: This game is more than adventure, is the game drew up on paper using watercolours, which includes the game detail and even the animations! This is a story about a little girl who is preparing to celebrate the New Year. She will meet the fabulous animals and wonders.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 1200 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 1200 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Any
